topic.title: What's New in the Current Version
topic.shortdesc: New security features in this release are: auditing for administrators and LDAP integration.

body.p: This release of Couchbase Server provides these new features:

dlentry.dd: Role-based access was introduced to achieve segregation of duties for administrators so that each administrator can do only a well-defined fixed set of operations based on their job description. See .
With X.509 certificates, Couchbase Server can strongly encrypt client-server communications and XDCR (Cross Data Center Replication). See .
